distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for open-vm-tools fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-20867: Fixed authentication bypass vulnerability in the vgauth module (bsc#1212143).
- CVE-2023-20900: Fixed SAML token signature bypass vulnerability (bsc#1214566).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A fully compromised ESXi host can force VMware Tools to fail to authenticate host-to-guest operations, impacting the confidentiality and integrity of the guest virtual machine.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: A malicious actor that has been granted  Guest Operation Privileges https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/8.0/vsphere-security/GUID-6A952214-0E5E-4CCF-9D2A-90948FF643EC.html ï¿½in a target virtual machine may be able to elevate their privileges if that target virtual machine has been assigned a more privileged  Guest Alias https://vdc-download.vmware.com/vmwb-repository/dcr-public/d1902b0e-d479-46bf-8ac9-cee0e31e8ec0/07ce8dbd-db48-4261-9b8f-c6d3ad8ba472/vim.vm.guest.AliasManager.html .
notes.title: Vulnerability description
